results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: በፊትም የኑሕን ሕዝቦች (አጥፍቷል)፡፡ እነርሱ በጣም በደለኞችና እጅግ የጠመሙ እነርሱ ነበሩና፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ይህ ከፊተኞቹ አስፈራሪዎች (ጎሳ) የኾነ አስፈራሪ ነው፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
